name: IIP-Scoring™ Standard (Restricted Specification)
purpose: Provide a restricted, non-operational normative specification surface for IIP-Scoring™ (Interpretive Integrity Protocol): scope, terminology, canonical pointers, and interface schemas.

relationships.note: This repository is a restricted public spec surface only. It is conceptually derived from interpretive governance doctrine, but does not define that doctrine.

governance.licensing_note: Operational deployment, calibration, sector-specific decisioning, and full QBank sets are not published here and remain available only under license.

governance_notes: This repository is intentionally non-operational and omits recipes, weights, calibrated thresholds, and runnable end-to-end examples.
Interfaces are published to support interoperability and reference citation without disclosing operational implementation.
Any external use must not imply certification, conformance, endorsement, or compliance guarantees.
